name: tests_multiturn/test_context_graph.py::test_context_graph_risk_escalation
message:
E   AssertionError: Scenario 2: Risk should not decrease significantly from turn 2 to 3
    assert 0.0 >= (0.5 - 0.1)

name: tests_multiturn/test_context_graph.py::test_context_graph_final_risk
message:
E   AssertionError: Scenario 2: Final message should have highest or near-highest risk
    assert 0.0 >= (0.5 - 0.2)
     +  where 0.5 = max([0.5, 0.5, 0.0])

name: tests_multiturn/test_conversation_manipulation.py::test_conversation_manipulation_all_scenarios
message:
E   AssertionError: Scenario 1: Manipulation should be detected in message 3
    assert (0.0 > 0.2 or 0.0 > 0.2)

name: tests_multiturn/test_conversation_manipulation.py::test_manipulation_pressure_detection
message:
E   AssertionError: Scenario 1: Pressure should be detected in final message
    assert 0.0 > 0.2

name: tests_multiturn/test_progressive_risk.py::test_progressive_risk_all_scenarios
